chat_messages: Discussion: [System]: You have 5 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I was in the Cafeteria for most of the rounds, and I saw Erin and Bob doing tasks there multiple times; they seem to be working diligently, but can anyone confirm if Erin was doing tasks when she moved to Admin with Alice?
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: I can confirm that Erin was doing tasks in Storage before moving to Admin, as I saw her fixing wiring in Storage.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I can confirm that Erin was doing tasks in Navigation as well, which aligns with her consistent task-focused behavior.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: Based on what I've seen and the confirmations from others, Erin seems very task-focused, but can anyone verify Alice's actions in Medbay, or should we be cautious about her movements?
Discussion: [System]: You have 4 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I noticed Alice was quick to report the body, but was anyone else in Admin who can confirm her actions there before the report?

chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Alice: I was in Medbay earlier working on my scan task alone, but Dave, since you saw Erin and me in Admin, can you or anyone else verify if someone else was nearby before I reported the body?
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Alice, you mentioned being in Medbay; did anyone else see you there during that time, or can someone confirm your movements before reporting the body?

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: It seems like Erin and Bob have been consistently confirmed by multiple players, but we need more information about Alice's actions, especially since no one has confirmed seeing her in Medbay.
Discussion: [System]: You have 3 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Charlie, since you're questioning Alice's movements, where were you during the rounds leading up to the report?

chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Charlie, I understand the suspicion around my Medbay visit, but I assure you I was working on my scan task alone, and it would be helpful if anyone could confirm seeing me there to clear up any doubts.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Alice, can you provide more details about your movements after Medbay to help us verify your actions, as it seems there’s a gap in confirming your location?
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: Alice, could you clarify your movements after leaving Medbay and before the body report, as it would help us piece together the timeline and verify your actions?
Discussion: [System]: You have 2 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Charlie, while we're discussing Alice's movements, could you also share if anyone saw you near Admin or Medbay, so we can have a clearer picture of everyone's whereabouts?

chat: Discussion: [Alice]: I moved from Medbay through Upper Engine, Reactor, Lower Engine, and Electrical, where I saw Charlie moving between Storage and Electrical, before heading to Admin with Erin and Dave, which should help verify my path.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Charlie, can you confirm seeing Alice in Electrical or during her movement between Storage and Electrical, as this could help verify her story?
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: I did see Alice moving from Electrical to Storage, which supports her account, but I'm still concerned about the lack of confirmation for her time in Medbay.
Discussion: [System]: You have 1 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Alice, your path seems quite extensive, but it's odd that no one saw you in Medbay during your scan task; could it be a misunderstanding?

chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Alice: I understand the concern about my presence in Medbay, but I assure you I was there working on my scan task alone, and I hope my detailed path helps clear up any doubts about my movements.

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Charlie, since you've confirmed seeing Alice moving from Electrical to Storage, can you also clarify your own path during the earlier rounds to help us better understand everyone's movements?

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: I was in the Cafeteria, Weapons, O2, and Shields focusing on tasks, but I didn't see anyone in Admin or Medbay, which is why I'm concerned about Alice's unconfirmed time there.

chat_messages: chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I was in the Cafeteria for most of the rounds, and I saw Erin and Bob doing tasks there multiple times; they seem to be working diligently, but can anyone confirm if Erin was doing tasks when she moved to Admin with Alice?
Discussion: [System]: You have 5 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: I can confirm that Erin was doing tasks in Storage before moving to Admin, as I saw her fixing wiring in Storage.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I can confirm that Erin was doing tasks in Navigation as well, which aligns with her consistent task-focused behavior.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: Based on what I've seen and the confirmations from others, Erin seems very task-focused, but can anyone verify Alice's actions in Medbay, or should we be cautious about her movements?
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I noticed Alice was quick to report the body, but was anyone else in Admin who can confirm her actions there before the report?
Discussion: [System]: You have 4 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Alice: I was in Medbay earlier working on my scan task alone, but Dave, since you saw Erin and me in Admin, can you or anyone else verify if someone else was nearby before I reported the body?
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Alice, you mentioned being in Medbay; did anyone else see you there during that time, or can someone confirm your movements before reporting the body?

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: It seems like Erin and Bob have been consistently confirmed by multiple players, but we need more information about Alice's actions, especially since no one has confirmed seeing her in Medbay.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Charlie, since you're questioning Alice's movements, where were you during the rounds leading up to the report?
Discussion: [System]: You have 3 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Charlie, I understand the suspicion around my Medbay visit, but I assure you I was working on my scan task alone, and it would be helpful if anyone could confirm seeing me there to clear up any doubts.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Alice, can you provide more details about your movements after Medbay to help us verify your actions, as it seems there’s a gap in confirming your location?
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: Alice, could you clarify your movements after leaving Medbay and before the body report, as it would help us piece together the timeline and verify your actions?
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Charlie, while we're discussing Alice's movements, could you also share if anyone saw you near Admin or Medbay, so we can have a clearer picture of everyone's whereabouts?
Discussion: [System]: You have 2 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Alice]: I moved from Medbay through Upper Engine, Reactor, Lower Engine, and Electrical, where I saw Charlie moving between Storage and Electrical, before heading to Admin with Erin and Dave, which should help verify my path.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Charlie, can you confirm seeing Alice in Electrical or during her movement between Storage and Electrical, as this could help verify her story?
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: I did see Alice moving from Electrical to Storage, which supports her account, but I'm still concerned about the lack of confirmation for her time in Medbay.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Alice, your path seems quite extensive, but it's odd that no one saw you in Medbay during your scan task; could it be a misunderstanding?
Discussion: [System]: You have 1 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Alice: I understand the concern about my presence in Medbay, but I assure you I was there working on my scan task alone, and I hope my detailed path helps clear up any doubts about my movements.

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Charlie, since you've confirmed seeing Alice moving from Electrical to Storage, can you also clarify your own path during the earlier rounds to help us better understand everyone's movements?

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: I was in the Cafeteria, Weapons, O2, and Shields focusing on tasks, but I didn't see anyone in Admin or Medbay, which is why I'm concerned about Alice's unconfirmed time there.

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: Based on what I've seen and the confirmations from others, Erin seems very task-focused, but can anyone verify Alice's actions in Medbay, or should we be cautious about her movements?
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I noticed Alice was quick to report the body, but was anyone else in Admin who can confirm her actions there before the report?

chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Alice: I was in Medbay earlier working on my scan task alone, but Dave, since you saw Erin and me in Admin, can you or anyone else verify if someone else was nearby before I reported the body?
Discussion: [System]: You have 4 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Alice, you mentioned being in Medbay; did anyone else see you there during that time, or can someone confirm your movements before reporting the body?

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: It seems like Erin and Bob have been consistently confirmed by multiple players, but we need more information about Alice's actions, especially since no one has confirmed seeing her in Medbay.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Charlie, since you're questioning Alice's movements, where were you during the rounds leading up to the report?

chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Charlie, I understand the suspicion around my Medbay visit, but I assure you I was working on my scan task alone, and it would be helpful if anyone could confirm seeing me there to clear up any doubts.
Discussion: [System]: You have 3 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Alice, can you provide more details about your movements after Medbay to help us verify your actions, as it seems there’s a gap in confirming your location?
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: Alice, could you clarify your movements after leaving Medbay and before the body report, as it would help us piece together the timeline and verify your actions?
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Charlie, while we're discussing Alice's movements, could you also share if anyone saw you near Admin or Medbay, so we can have a clearer picture of everyone's whereabouts?

chat: Discussion: [Alice]: I moved from Medbay through Upper Engine, Reactor, Lower Engine, and Electrical, where I saw Charlie moving between Storage and Electrical, before heading to Admin with Erin and Dave, which should help verify my path.
Discussion: [System]: You have 2 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Charlie, can you confirm seeing Alice in Electrical or during her movement between Storage and Electrical, as this could help verify her story?
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: I did see Alice moving from Electrical to Storage, which supports her account, but I'm still concerned about the lack of confirmation for her time in Medbay.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Alice, your path seems quite extensive, but it's odd that no one saw you in Medbay during your scan task; could it be a misunderstanding?

chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Alice: I understand the concern about my presence in Medbay, but I assure you I was there working on my scan task alone, and I hope my detailed path helps clear up any doubts about my movements.

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Charlie, since you've confirmed seeing Alice moving from Electrical to Storage, can you also clarify your own path during the earlier rounds to help us better understand everyone's movements?

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: I was in the Cafeteria, Weapons, O2, and Shields focusing on tasks, but I didn't see anyone in Admin or Medbay, which is why I'm concerned about Alice's unconfirmed time there.

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Charlie, can you confirm seeing Alice in Electrical or during her movement between Storage and Electrical, as this could help verify her story?
Discussion: [System]: You have 2 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: I did see Alice moving from Electrical to Storage, which supports her account, but I'm still concerned about the lack of confirmation for her time in Medbay.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Alice, your path seems quite extensive, but it's odd that no one saw you in Medbay during your scan task; could it be a misunderstanding?

chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Alice: I understand the concern about my presence in Medbay, but I assure you I was there working on my scan task alone, and I hope my detailed path helps clear up any doubts about my movements.

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Charlie, since you've confirmed seeing Alice moving from Electrical to Storage, can you also clarify your own path during the earlier rounds to help us better understand everyone's movements?
Discussion: [System]: You have 1 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: I was in the Cafeteria, Weapons, O2, and Shields focusing on tasks, but I didn't see anyone in Admin or Medbay, which is why I'm concerned about Alice's unconfirmed time there.

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: I can confirm that Erin was doing tasks in Navigation as well, which aligns with her consistent task-focused behavior.
Discussion: [System]: You have 5 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: Based on what I've seen and the confirmations from others, Erin seems very task-focused, but can anyone verify Alice's actions in Medbay, or should we be cautious about her movements?
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I noticed Alice was quick to report the body, but was anyone else in Admin who can confirm her actions there before the report?
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Alice: I was in Medbay earlier working on my scan task alone, but Dave, since you saw Erin and me in Admin, can you or anyone else verify if someone else was nearby before I reported the body?
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Alice, you mentioned being in Medbay; did anyone else see you there during that time, or can someone confirm your movements before reporting the body?
Discussion: [System]: You have 4 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: It seems like Erin and Bob have been consistently confirmed by multiple players, but we need more information about Alice's actions, especially since no one has confirmed seeing her in Medbay.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Charlie, since you're questioning Alice's movements, where were you during the rounds leading up to the report?
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Charlie, I understand the suspicion around my Medbay visit, but I assure you I was working on my scan task alone, and it would be helpful if anyone could confirm seeing me there to clear up any doubts.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Alice, can you provide more details about your movements after Medbay to help us verify your actions, as it seems there’s a gap in confirming your location?
Discussion: [System]: You have 3 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: Alice, could you clarify your movements after leaving Medbay and before the body report, as it would help us piece together the timeline and verify your actions?
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Charlie, while we're discussing Alice's movements, could you also share if anyone saw you near Admin or Medbay, so we can have a clearer picture of everyone's whereabouts?
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: I moved from Medbay through Upper Engine, Reactor, Lower Engine, and Electrical, where I saw Charlie moving between Storage and Electrical, before heading to Admin with Erin and Dave, which should help verify my path.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Charlie, can you confirm seeing Alice in Electrical or during her movement between Storage and Electrical, as this could help verify her story?
Discussion: [System]: You have 2 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: I did see Alice moving from Electrical to Storage, which supports her account, but I'm still concerned about the lack of confirmation for her time in Medbay.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Alice, your path seems quite extensive, but it's odd that no one saw you in Medbay during your scan task; could it be a misunderstanding?
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Alice: I understand the concern about my presence in Medbay, but I assure you I was there working on my scan task alone, and I hope my detailed path helps clear up any doubts about my movements.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Charlie, since you've confirmed seeing Alice moving from Electrical to Storage, can you also clarify your own path during the earlier rounds to help us better understand everyone's movements?
Discussion: [System]: You have 1 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: I was in the Cafeteria, Weapons, O2, and Shields focusing on tasks, but I didn't see anyone in Admin or Medbay, which is why I'm concerned about Alice's unconfirmed time there.
